definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be foolish, or a fool, usu. in moral or spititual sense (Syr. skal Aph. act foolishly; saklo0 foolish, etc., Targum [[סְכַל]] der. species, act foolishly; [[סַכְלָא]] fool; Chr Pal Aram. skl, Aph. = a(marta/nw, also deriv. Schwally:Idlot. 62; As. saklu, perh. foolish, Dl:HWB 498; Aram. skal [[סְכַל]] know, be intelligent, cause to understand, etc. (der. species), cf. [[שׂכל]]; Me:Chrest. Targ. derives both these opp. mngs. fr. Ar. 4akolun form, likeness. Gerber:178 thinks Heb. vb. denom.);—

definitions.title: Piel
definitions.body: Impf. [[יְסַכֵּל]] Is 44:25, Imv. [[סַכֶּל־נׇא]] 2Sa 15:31, make foolish, turn into foolishness.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. [[נִסְכַּלְתָּ]] 2Ch 16:9; [[נִסְכָָּלְתָּ]] 1Sa 13:13; 1 S. [[נִסְכַּלְתִּי]] 2Sa 24:10 = 1Ch 21:8, act or do foolishly.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. [[הִסְכַּלְתָּ]] Ge 31:28 (E), 1 S. [[הִסְכַּלְתִּי]] 1Sa 26:21, do foolishly, play the fool.
